// header.component.ts import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { searchQ = new FormControl(); constructor(private router: Router) {} ngOnInit(): void {} searchQuery(): void { this.router.navigate(['/search', this.searchQ]); } }
